Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to substantiate the statement that Sen. Barbara Boxer "passed only three bills in 18 years" into law. Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide an alternative explanation for why Sen. Barbara Boxer may have a relatively low number of bills passed into law.
